pageContent: Purpose: To evaluate the performance of multiparametric magnetic resonance imaging (mpMRI) and PSA testing in follow-up after high intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) focal therapy for localized prostate cancer.

metaData.source:
Recurrence of prostate cancer after HIFU. Proposal of a novel predictive index
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/29957755/
